caption: Relating to an annual report on certain uncompensated hospital care costs.
last_action: 04/21/2025 H Scheduled for public hearing on . . .
summary: This bill requires an annual report on uncompensated hospital care costs. It does not specifically target or impact Chinese immigrants or any other immigrant groups. The bill appears to be a general healthcare administrative measure focused on tracking unreimbursed hospital expenses across all populations.
translation: 该法案要求对医院未补偿护理成本进行年度报告。该法案并不特别针对或影响中国移民或任何其他移民群体。这是一项一般性的医疗保健管理措施，主要关注追踪所有人群中未报销的医院费用。
committees:
1. House Committee on Public Health
2. House Committee on Healthcare
3. House Committee on Appropriations
